item.title: Post Punk playlist for 9/2017
item.description: Including: Asylum Party, Bauhaus, Killing Joke, Kukl, Preoccupations, The Chameleons, The Chameleons Uk, The Kill, This Heat, Wire.

item.description: Including: Bauhaus, Echo & The Bunnymen, Joy Division, Mission Of Burma, Pere Ubu, Pink Turns Blue, Rowland S. Howard, The Chameleons, Vietcong, Wire.

item.description: Including: Crack Cloud, Grave Pleasures, Kryzys, No Trend, Scratch Acid, Suicide, The Cleaners From Venus, The Jesus And Mary Chain, This Heat, Virgin Prunes.

item.title: Post Punk playlist for 2/2017
item.description: Including: At A Later Date, Echo And The Bunnymen, In Letter Form, Magazine, Mission Of Burma, Public Image Limited Pil, Television, The Cure, The Sound, The Units.
